name: Three Time's the Charm Online Trivia | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which word names a group of three singers?
questions.explanation:
trio.

	The word part TRI means "three" in words such as TRIO. Two singers or musicians perform a duet, four perform a quartet, and one performs a solo.

questions.text: Which word names three sisters who were born on the same day?
questions.explanation:
triplets.

	You probably know at least one set of twins, and you may know a set of triplets. Few of us know sets of quadruplets or quintuplets (sets of four and five), because they are very rare.

questions.text: In "Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire," Harry participates in a Tri-Wizard Tournament. What do you think TRI-WIZARD means?
questions.explanation:
three wizards.

	Even though the tournament is meant for three young wizards and witches only, Harry is the fourth contestant, due to Voldemort's dastardly plan.

a triangle.

	A square has four sides, a hexagon has six, and an octagon has eight.

questions.text: Which title does NOT fit in the group?
questions.explanation:
Snow White and the _______ Dwarves.

	In fairy tales and nursery rhymes, three is a popular number (seven is a popular number, too--some people think that it is lucky).  The story of Snow White featured seven dwarves.

questions.text: If you triple the number 10, what is the result?
questions.explanation:
30.

	To triple a number means to multiply it by three.

thrice.

	THIRD means "number three in line."

questions.text: Which word comes next in this pattern? eleven, twelve, _______
questions.explanation:
thirteen.

	Teenagers are kids aged thirteen through nineteen. Eleven- and twelve-year-olds are sometimes called "pre-teens."

questions.text: What do you think the Russian word TROIKA means?
questions.correct: a cart pulled by three horses
questions.explanation:
a cart pulled by three horses.

	There is a Russian folkdance called "Troika" in which three dancers pretend to be horses pulling a cart or chariot.

questions.text: Which word does NOT have to do with the number three?
questions.explanation:
thrill.

	To thrill means to amaze or excite. To fill out a form in triplicate means to fill out three copies of the form. A triplex is a building with three separate apartments in it. A trilogy is a group of three books that belong to a series, like "The Lord of the Rings" trilogy.
